entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having a spectacular victory and being involved in a duel with Grindelwald. He is also described as taking an interest in the Potter family.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: Grindelwald is mentioned as conjuring a white handkerchief from his wand and being involved in a duel with Dumbledore.

entities.name: skeeter
entities.description: Skeeter is mentioned as writing a book about the Potter-Dumbledore relationship and refusing to give away more information.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Grindelwald are described as being involved in a spectacular duel.
Dumbledore is described as taking an interest in the Potter family.
